thread.title: BRIEF-Sanofi confident in Dengvaxia's safety and potential

title: BRIEF-Sanofi confident in Dengvaxia's safety and potential
text:
April 19, 2018 / 5:03 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago BRIEF-Sanofi confident in Dengvaxia's safety and potential Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Sanofi SA: 
* SANOFI SAYS CONFIDENT IN DENGVAXIAâ€™S SAFETY AND PROVEN POTENTIAL TO REDUCE DENGUE DISEASE BURDEN IN ENDEMIC COUNTRIES 
* SANOFI SAYS DENGUE CONTINUES TO REPRESENT A SIGNIFICANT PUBLIC HEALTH CHALLENGE 
* SANOFI SAYS TO CONTINUE LONG-TERM COMMITMENT TO GLOBAL DENGUE BURDEN REDUCTION 
* SANOFI SAYS TO CONTINUE WORK WITH INTERNATIONAL PUBLIC HEALTH COMMUNITY AND ENDEMIC COUNTRIES Further company coverage: (Paris Newsroom)
